document.full_text: leo kahn, who co-founded staples and helped start the age of "big box" retail stores, died wednesday in boston. he was 94.
document.title: leo kahn, co-founder of staples, dies at 94
lines_and_colors: leo kahn, who co-founded staples and helped start the age of "big box" retail stores, died wednesday in boston. he was 94.
